intro: The v-window component provides the baseline functionality for transitioning content from 1 pane to another. Other components such as v-tabs, v-carousel and v-stepper utilize this component at their core.

usage.heading: Usage
usage.intro: Designed to easily cycle through content, v-window provides a simple interface to create truly custom implementations.

account.heading: Account creation
account.intro: Create rich forms with smooth animations. v-window automatically tracks the current selection index to automatically change the transition direction. This can be manually controlled with the reverse prop.

onboarding.heading: Onboarding
onboarding.intro: v-window makes it easy to create custom components such as a different styled stepper.
